Control.ttp: nlThis page is for maintaining information related to 'System Settings'.
nlProvides multiple choices for Internet time server.

Control.lbl: nlAutomatically adjust clock for Daylight Saving Time
Control.ttp: nlWhen checkmarked, the clock on the PAC will automatically be adjusted for 'Daylight Saving Time'.

Control.lbl: nlSync with an Internet Time Server (Reboot Required)
Control.ttp: nlSynchronize the date and time on the device with the date and time received from an internet time server. (A reboot is initially required once enabled)
nlSynchronize the date and time on the device with the date and time on my computer.
nlProvides the amount of time to wait for the next synchronization to take place between the internet time server and the PAC..
nlClick to display online help related to this page...
nlClick to save the contents of this page to the current device...
nlClick to refresh the contents of this page...
nlClick to immediately refresh the 'Machine Date Time' on the device using the chosen 'Internet Time Server'.
nlClick to reset the contents of this page to what it was after the last save...

Messages.Message: nlThe System Settings cannot be saved since the specified Machine Name: '{0}' already exists on this network.
nl'Machine Name' must be at least 4 characters in length.
nl'Machine Name' must begin with a character and end with either a character or a number.
nlAre you sure you want to Reboot the PAC?
nl'Internet Time Server' must be at least 4 characters in length.
nl'Internet Time Server' must be provided.
nl'Refresh Interval' must be at least 5 minutes and no more than 2 weeks.
nlTo effectively initiate the changes made to the current System Settings, it is recommended that you reboot the PAC...
